VLIB_histogram_1D_Init_U8

Detailed Description


Functions

int32_t VLIB_histogram_1D_Init_U8 (const uint8_t *restrict binEdges, const int32_t numBins, uint8_t *restrict histArray)

Function Documentation

int32_t VLIB_histogram_1D_Init_U8 ( const uint8_t *restrict  binEdges,
const int32_t  numBins,
uint8_t *restrict  histArray 
)

Description
Initializes buffer for 1D histogram computation by VLIB_histogram_1D_U8 or VLIB_weightedHistogram_1D_U8
Parameters:
[in] *binEdges Array containing the edges of the histogram bins (UQ8.0)
[in] numBins Number of bins (SQ31.0)
[in,out] *histArray Buffer for internal use (UQ8.0)
Assumptions
  • The values of binEdges must increase monotonically.
  • histArray should be initialized to 0.
  • histArray should have a size equal to the max possible value that the input quantity can take + 1 (eg. if max value of input is 255, then histArray should be of size 256 bytes). This is done to save memory for cases where arrays values do not span the full range that the data type allows for.
Benchmarks:
See VLIB_Test_Report.html for cycle and memory information.
